channel.title: Himuliation
channel.description:
[center]~~STAFF LIST~~
Main Owner/Coder: Imagine
Admins: Zade Gedtodehel Smoke_Dope Fire
Mods: Open Open Open
Donators: Fire Smoke_Dope Jack Samantha Adrenaline
~~Downloads & Info~~
Himuliation 667 Download:
http://www.mediafire.com/?bd6n4na0424q3oj Vote: http://himuliation.webs.com/vote Webclient: Will be up soon! Forums: http://himuliation.webs.com
~~Features of Himuliation 667~~
Want to play a server that has an actual economy? Himuliation goes above and beyond.
Perfect Combat - PvP / PvM | Stable Server | Warriors Guild | Castle Wars | Fight Caves | Active community | Lag-free | Best economy
Why Himuliation?
Our server is run by professionals who actually know what they're doing. When you're playing Himuliation, you'll get the same feel you would playing real RuneScape! We have plenty of content and a great community, with enticing features that will surely sway you over to come check us out!
Main Features:
Active players & 100% uptime Daily updates Reliable Offshore Dedicated Server PKing, Skilling, Dicing, Flower game, and Many mini-games & Bosses All working Prayers including Retribution & Redemption All Curse Prayers fully functional PERFECT COMBAT - Lag free, perfect delays, perfect switching & bridding ! Castle Wars Duel Arena Full perfect Fight Caves mini-game - with 63 waves! 100% Summoning! Your familiar helps you fight in Multi-Zones God wars dungeon nearly perfected!
More Features:
Mage Bank PK'ing active! ECONOMY PERFECTED Edge PK'ing active! NO LAG Server Wide Events Perfect Switches Correct Combat Formulas All 712 Items All 712 Npc's Correct spots for ALL Weapons New Jad Torva, Virtus, Pernix & their Hp Effect! All Chaotics Turmoil/Curses 100% Working Godswords. 100% Working mute. 100% working IPban. 100% Working Dragon claws 667+ Items Added including Npc's 100% Working Spirit shield effects. Corporal Beast 100% Working Barrows. Good dialogue. Perfect Combat system. 100% Working curses. 100% Working Vengeance. 100% Working Ancients List. 100% Working Ignore List. 100% Working Friends List. 100% Working clan chat Including loot share. 100% Working Skillcape Emotes. 100% Working Lock Exp. Fixed No-Clip. 90% Working Trade. 90% Working Following. added 100% working barrage orb MANY BOSSES Nex 100% Strykwerms Full GWD Tormented Demons Drop claws.. 100% Flasks 100% Loyal emotes 100% Pets 100% Dice/Flower gaming 711 cache ( Means upgraded armour ) !!!!
Join now!
Some pics : http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/6842/nexee.png
http://img803.imageshack.us/img803/7646/melee.png
http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/2443/flasks.png
http://img528.imageshack.us/img528/325/dominiontower.png
100% Dominion tower ( bosses added !!)
http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/3899/homera.png[/center]
